name: Marrie's Puzzle
description:
Credits: Music: www.bensound.com       Royalty Free Music from Bensound

Movement:  A/D  or ←/→ 
Jump: Space
Hold W/↑ to climb trees

Press Q to travel between Now/Future

Press E to pick up/put down seeds

Press R to reset level

Grab the key to go to next level

Some buildings only exist Now, 
but some only in Future

Seeds will grow in Future
Blue seeds won't grow if  you are holding them!
You can travel time (Q)  with blue seeds, but not red seeds
In other words, you can hold a blue seed and climb trees!
